Class SimplePathVisitor

java.lang.Object
java.nio.file.SimpleFileVisitor<Path>
org.apache.commons.io.file.SimplePathVisitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileVisitor<Path>, PathVisitor
Direct Known Subclasses:
CountingPathVisitor, NoopPathVisitor
public abstract class SimplePathVisitor extends SimpleFileVisitor<Path> implements PathVisitor
A SimpleFileVisitor typed to a Path.
